title: Textile, 18th century
description: Cream white cotton, block printed in large scale naturalistic flower design in all-over clusters; iris, lily, amaryllis, daffodil and pineapple. Shades of red, dark purple, brown, blue; remains of yellow, now faded, show in sections of leaves, indicating combining of yellow over blue for green. A background printing of fine small scale foliage, in shadow effect, light brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: relief printed. 1962-74-3.
